DOC.brief_summary: The COMPETE study prospective , randomize , two-arm multi-center clinical trial compare two commercially available coronary stent : Chrono Carbostent Carbofilm™ Coated vs Driver/Micro-Driver Coronary Stent System . In study , 204 subject include ( 2:1 randomization Chrono : Driver/Micro Driver ) 6 Italian site .
DOC.brief_title: COMPETE : A Clinical Evaluation Chrono Carbostent Carbofilm™ Coated Stent
DOC.criteria: Patients clinical evidence ischemic heart disease ; No clinical ECG change suggestive ongoing acute infarction ; De novo lesion > 50 % < 100 % diameter stenosis ( DS ) native coronary vessel TIMI flow > = 1 . Reference diameter > 2.5 mm < 4.0 mm ; Patients maximum two coronary lesion treat maximum 2 study stent ; Lesion length > 30 mm ; Significant ( > 50 % ) stenosis proximal distal target lesion might impede run ; Lesions locate saphenous vein graft ; Lesions locate unprotected leave main ; Presence > 40 % stenosis leave main ; Ostial lesion ; Lesion locate bifurcation ; Target lesion visible thrombus ; Chronic total occlusion ; Treatment restenotic lesion ; Previous implantation stent ( BMS/DES ) target vessel .
